custom_css: li {background-color: white; margin-bottom: 1.75em; list-style: none; padding: 1.75em; letter-spacing: 0.025em; line-height: 1.25em; border-radius: 0.5em; transition: transform 0.15s ease-in-out;}
.link {padding: 10px; padding-left: 15px; padding-right: 15px; background-color: white; border-radius: 100px; margin-bottom: 7px;}
